info.title: OData Service for namespace ProductService
info.description:
This OData service is located at http://localhost/Products.svc/

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](http://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Product],[Product]-*>[Category],[Product]-0..1>[PeopleService.Supplier{bg:white}],[Product]-0..1>[ProductDetail],[Product]^[FeaturedProduct],[FeaturedProduct]-0..1>[Advertisement],[ProductDetail],[ProductDetail]-0..1>[Product],[Category],[Category]-*>[Product],[Advertisement],[Advertisement]-0..1>[FeaturedProduct])

## References
- [PeopleService](http://petstore.swagger.io/?url=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ralfhandl/odata/master/People.openapi.json)
